name: get_team_info
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool valorant_esports_v2.
Tool description: The Valorant Esports is a user-friendly tool that allows you to extract data from the website vlr.gg. 
API description: Retrieves comprehensive information about a team, including player details, events, results, and more, using the VLR.gg team ID.

teamid.description: The team ID from VLR.gg for which information is being retrieved.
